relation: there are plenty of security officers but i never see them outside. the lighting at night is not good but rarely has an incident happened.
the clubs have a variety of features from live music to dj. reasonable cover (usually $5), but the parking is horendous!
in this economy, nothing is cheap!
dance clubs, ice skating, theatre performances, karaoke, billiards, wine arts.
normal fast food with a few exceptional restaurants, bars or pubs.
study! manage your time. get involved. choose your major wisely!
the professors are exceptional. the curriculum is tough but gratifying. the clubs and extracurricular activities are diverse.

textAfterTable: Tips for prospective students Trust me get a tutor or collaborate in study groups to get through tough courses. In three sentences I loved Ivy Tech Community College, great teachers, advisors, and fellow classmates. I felt challenged through my courses, but not stressed out from them. I met people just like myself with children, families, and looking to get ahead in life.
